Key Stage 1 > Level 1

This course covers fundamental topics, taught using teaching aids such as toy train carriages and labels (for variables), a line of carriages (sequence), etc. and through the context of story-telling, specifically a treasure hunt which runs through the course.

Weeks Concepts
Week 1 Variables and Feature Selection
Week 2 Arrays and Clustering
Week 3 Boolean Logic
Week 4 If/Then/Else and Decision Tree
Week 5 Sequences
Week 6 For Loops
Week 7 Trees
Week 8 Morse Code
Week 9 Robotics Project 1
Week 10 Robotics Project 2
